fields.name: ClassificationsToInclude
fields.description: The update classifications to select when installing patches for Linux.

fields.name: MaintenanceRunId
fields.description: This is used as a maintenance run identifier for Auto VM Guest Patching in Linux.

fields.name: PackageNameMasksToExclude
fields.description: packages to exclude in the patch operation. Format: packageName_packageVersion

fields.name: PackageNameMasksToInclude
fields.description: packages to include in the patch operation. Format: packageName_packageVersion
